short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension performs SEO of the loaded page and generates a report.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a chrome extension that performs SEO analysis of the currently active tab and generates a report. It identifies SEO related errors on the page and also makes recommendations to improve search engine visibility.

It is a feature-rich, light-weight extension that is undergoing continual improvement.
